title: Chelsea make approach for Roma's Emerson Palmieri
description: Chelsea have made an approach to Roma for their defender Emerson Palmieri, according to Sky in Italy.
content: It is understood that a full-back is Chelsea manager Antonio Conte's main priority this month and that Roma are prepared to let him go for a fee of around Â£20m.Sky Italia say the player is keen on the move, and wants to work with Conte, with Chelsea his preferred destination.The 23-year-old Brazilian-born player joined Roma from Santos in 2015, but has only played 15 minutes of Serie A football this season.He has represented Brazil at under-17 level and is now an Italian citizen.
